short_description: first sensor is an electronical components manufacturer based in berlin, germany.
long_description: as a part of te connectivity our company develops and produces sensors and customized sensor solutions for applications in the industrial, medical and mobility segments. our customers include both renowned corporations and fledgling technology companies that rely on our innovative products and expertise. we work together to turn visions such as industry 4.0, e-health and autonomous driving into reality. a crucial advantage of first sensor is our ability to handle the entire value chain in sensor technology, from the wafer to the smart sensor system. we also have the in-house technologies needed to combine the properties of materials and components in innovative ways as part of sophisticated processes. our specialists are committed to researching all aspects of high-quality sensor systems, allowing them to continually spur innovation and make it a reality. this acts as an ideal platform on which to realize high-performance projects and thus consolidate our market leadership. the expertise and dedication of our 1,000 employees who work at sales and production sites all over the world – in germany, the netherlands, uk, france, sweden, denmark, us, canada and china – are the foundations on which our success is based. to ensure that we can continue developing top-quality customized products for our customers well into the future, we are looking to bring innovative minds on board to help us shape the future. we will give you responsibility and freedom – not only for your ideas, but also for our mutual development.
business_tags: electrical, electronic, home appliances manufacturing | electrical and electronic manufacturing | mechanical engineering | smart sensor | custom or production | custom sensors
generated_description: first sensor, a subsidiary of te connectivity, is a company that specializes in the development and production of sensors and customized sensor solutions for industrial, medical, and mobility applications. with a focus on industry 4.0, e-health, and autonomous driving, the company works closely with both established corporations and emerging technology companies to bring their innovative products and expertise to life. first sensor's unique advantage lies in their ability to handle the entire value chain of sensor technology, from wafer to smart sensor system, and possess in-house technologies for combining materials and components in innovative ways. their team of 1,000 employees from various countries worldwide, including germany, the netherlands, uk, france, sweden, denmark, us, canada, and china, contribute to their success. to ensure continued development of high-quality customized products, first sensor is actively seeking innovative minds to join their team and contribute to shaping the future.
